title: Idea for new League cinematic
body: Wouldn't it be pretty cool if Riot made a new cinematic (like A New Dawn/A Twist of Fate)  and take a fight or fights from something like worlds, and recreate them in the cinematic style from the first or third person view of one of the champs and follow them through the fights? It'd be a pretty fantastic glimpse of what first/third person league might look like :)
